name: archpriest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a high-ranking priest, especially in some Roman Catholic churches: He was recently appointed archpriest of Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome. an archpriest of the Russian Orthodox church
More examplesFewer examplesHe was ordained priest by the head of the mission, being later raised to archpriest.Rev. Michael Oleksa, archpriest at St. Alexis in Anchorage and the best-known Orthodox pastor in Alaska Archpriest John Joseph Mowatt
